legendaryItems.Effect: Once per adventure, summon a demon minion with a toughness of 4 that dies with second wound.  It has a speed of 5 and adds (Power Die) (Enhancement Die) to its attacks.  It suffers a scratch after each of its turns.

legendaryItems.name: Druid's Shillelagh
legendaryItems.Effect: Add (Enhancement Die) to spellcasting. Add another (Blessing Die) for each active ongoing spell that you have cast.  You may use the below spending options on spellcasting.
legendaryItems.spending_text_02: Extend the duration of one of your ongoing spells by 1.

legendaryItems.name: Falchion Of Seven Winds
legendaryItems.Effect: Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    Attacks with this weapon automatically hit an enemy on a tile behind the original target (adjacent but further away).

legendaryItems.name: Golden Hawk
legendaryItems.Effect: Range 6  Add (Power Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks.

legendaryItems.name: Heart Of Gazhuatl
legendaryItems.Effect: Become immune against 'Cripple' and 'Bleed' as long as you carry this.    If your vessel would die, you may consume this to prevent its death, restoring all wounds except one.

legendaryItems.name: Infinite Breadcrumbs
legendaryItems.Effect: Once per adventure, you may determine the layout of a just discovered room (instead of rolling for it).    You may also permanently discard this item to heal two wounds from yourself.

legendaryItems.name: Kris Of Leeching
legendaryItems.spending_text_01: Heal a scratch from an ally within range 3.

legendaryItems.name: Laraksian Tea
legendaryItems.Effect: Consume to regenerate a scratch.    This item refills itself as soon as you defeat an enemy (deliver the final blow).

legendaryItems.name: Leyforest Cloak
legendaryItems.Effect: Add (Blessing Die) to attacks, defense and spellcasting.    You may use the below spending options on any roll.
legendaryItems.spending_text_01: Reduce one of your cooldowns by 1.

legendaryItems.name: Leyforest Greaves
legendaryItems.Effect: Gain +2 speed.    Gain +1 toughness on all rows.

legendaryItems.name: Mirror Of Envy
legendaryItems.Effect: During any town phase, you may declare an item that you or an ally owns.  From that point onwards, the 'Mirror Of Envy' mimicks that item and works exactly like the copied item.

legendaryItems.name: Orb Of Refreshment
legendaryItems.Effect: You may spend 2 movement points to put one token on this item (max. 5).  At any time, you may spend 3 such tokens to end the cooldown of any one's ability card.

legendaryItems.name: Shield Of The Bulwark
legendaryItems.Effect: Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending options on defense.
legendaryItems.spending_text_01: After determining the result, prevent one scratch.
legendaryItems.spending_text_02: +5 Power, but the shield suffers a fault.
legendaryItems.spending_text_03: Reduce the cooldown of one of your cards with an interrupt effect by 1.

legendaryItems.name: Sword Of Flowing Water
legendaryItems.Effect: Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks.

soulShopItems.name: Soul Infusion
soulShopItems.Effect: Immediately gain +1 XP for one player's soul to buy or upgrade ability cards.

soulShopItems.name: Vessel Core
soulShopItems.Effect: Immediately gain +1 XP for one player's vessel synchronization.

soulShopItems.name: Ambrosia
soulShopItems.Effect: Permanently unlock one additional perk for one player's current vessel, ignoring usual limits (they may have two perks of the same column with this).

soulShopItems.name: Enthralled Vessel
soulShopItems.Effect: One player may take over a vessel of their choice (mythical vessels not allowed).

soulShopItems.name: Retrain
soulShopItems.Effect: Replace the default (Plus) spending option of your vessel with another one of your choice    OR    Change the learned perks of your vessel.

soulShopItems.name: Sell Soul Shard
soulShopItems.Effect: Immediately obtain 20 gold coins.

soulShopItems.name: Box Of Imports
soulShopItems.Effect: Immediately draw 10 random item cards from the next two adventure tiers. You may purchase one of them for the usual gold costs.

soulShopItems.name: Advance Lance
soulShopItems.Effect: Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    Gain 'Reach'.    Before performing a melee attack, you may Move (2) in a straight or diagonal line (gain'Slippery').

soulShopItems.name: Chakram Of Solstice
soulShopItems.Effect: Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.  If you are not adjacent to an ally, add another (Enhancement Die).    May be used as a ranged weapon with a range of 4.
soulShopItems.spending_text_01: Perform a free attack (max. 2 per round).

soulShopItems.name: Mithril Chainmail
soulShopItems.Effect: Add (Power Die) to defense.  Gain +2 speed.  Add (Cursed Die) to attacks.    Add the below spending options to defense.

soulShopItems.name: Claws of Ebberesk
soulShopItems.Effect: Add (Enhancement Die) to your attacks.  Your attacks are still considered 'unarmed' and as if you had your hands free.    Add the below spending options to attacks.

soulShopItems.name: Whip Of The Succubus
soulShopItems.Effect: Add (Enhancement Die) to your attacks.  Gain 'Reach'.    Add the below spending options to attacks.

soulShopItems.name: The All-Penetrating Eye
soulShopItems.Effect: You may ignore the requirement of line-of-sight while casting a spell (range must still be fulfilled), but add (Cursed Die) to the roll.

soulShopItems.name: Bottomless Backpack
soulShopItems.Effect: At the beginning of each adventure, draw item cards until you found two consumable items.  You may keep those for free.

soulShopItems.name: Scroll of the Ancients
soulShopItems.Effect: Once per adventure, by spending two movement points, you may cast any one spell (that exists in the game).  It automatically succeeds without any spendings.

soulShopItems.name: Ring Of Invulnerability
soulShopItems.Effect: At the beginning of a round, you may activate this item, but only once per adventure.    You may then ignore any incoming scratches, wounds and negative effects during that round.

soulShopItems.name: Necklace Of Binding
soulShopItems.Effect: At the beginning of each adventure, declare an armor or weapon that you wear.    As you wear it, it becomes immune to faults and adds (White Die) to corresponding rolls (to rolls it already adds benefits to).

soulShopItems.name: Spell Focus Staff
soulShopItems.Effect: Add (Plus) to each of your spellcasting rolls.    At the beginning of each adventure, declare a spell of yours. Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) when attempting that spell.

soulShopItems.name: Bow Of Lightning
soulShopItems.Effect: Range 7  Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    You may spend each (Plus) to add +1 Power OR to hit one additional target within range (deal max. 1 wound to those additional targets each).

soulShopItems.name: Archer's Garments
soulShopItems.Effect: Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to defense.  Add (Standard Die) to ranged attacks.    Add the below spending options to attacks.

soulShopItems.name: Necklace of War
soulShopItems.Effect: Add the below spending options to attacks.

soulShopItems.name: Tome Of Demons
soulShopItems.Effect: Your summoned minions gain +1 Power on all their attacks.

soulShopItems.name: Kindlespark Potion
soulShopItems.Effect: Consume to regenerate a wound.    When used, the potion refills itself at the end of the adventure.

soulShopItems.name: Robe of the Mender
soulShopItems.Effect: Add (Blessing Die) to defense.    Whenever you perform the major action of a 'meta' type card, heal one scratch from an ally within range 2.

soulShopItems.name: Band Of Teleportation
soulShopItems.Effect: Spend one movement point and suffer one scratch to assume any new position on the game board.

soulShopItems.name: Astral Gloves
soulShopItems.Effect: After casting a spell, you may discard another spell from your hand on cooldown 5, then double the amount of wounds that spell causes (also applies to summons).

soulShopItems.name: Brooch Of Soothing Winds
soulShopItems.Effect: Once per turn, you may spend 2 movement points to heal one scratch from an ally within range 2.

soulShopItems.name: Slate Of Fate
soulShopItems.Effect: You may play one additional adventure (to a max. of 4 per tier) in the current tier or any of the previous ones.  You may also re-attempt a failed adventure.

soulShopItems.name: Scroll Of Resurrection
soulShopItems.Effect: Immediately get a vessel back that died during your last adventure. The original player who had it regains the perks that were already unlocked.

soulShopItems.name: Shield Of The Templar
soulShopItems.Effect: Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to defense and spellcasting.    Add the below spending options to defense.
soulShopItems.spending_text_02: Reduce the cooldown of one of your cards with an interrupt effect by 1.

soulShopItems.name: Rune: Enchant
soulShopItems.Effect: Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    Convert a (Blessing Die) it adds into an (Enhancement Die).    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

soulShopItems.name: Rune: Fuel
soulShopItems.Effect: Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    When attacking, you may suffer 2 scratches to add (Power Die) (Blessing Die).    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

soulShopItems.name: Rune: Drain
soulShopItems.Effect: Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    When killing an enemy, heal one scratch from yourself.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

soulShopItems.name: Rune: Mark
soulShopItems.Effect: Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    When attacking, you may spend (Star) to cause 'Weaken'.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

soulShopItems.name: Rune: Fortune
soulShopItems.Effect: Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    When attacking, you may convert one botch into (Star).    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

soulShopItems.name: Rune: Focus
soulShopItems.Effect: Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    When attacking, you may spend one (Star) to reduce one of your cooldowns by 2.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

soulShopItems.name: Rune: Void
soulShopItems.Effect: Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    When attacking, count any rolled blanks as (Plus) instead.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

soulShopItems.name: Rune: Holy
soulShopItems.Effect: Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    When attacking, you may spend (Star) (Star) to heal 2 scratches from yourself. If you don't have any scratches, heal a wound instead.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

soulShopItems.name: Rune: Adamant
soulShopItems.Effect: Attach this to an armor.    Add (Blessing Die) to defense.    Can only attach one rune per armor.

soulShopItems.name: Rune: Stoic
soulShopItems.Effect: Attach this to an armor.    You may spend (Plus) on defense to reduce the duration of a negative effect on you by 1.    Can only attach one rune per armor.

soulShopItems.name: Rune: Rage
soulShopItems.Effect: Attach this to an armor.    You may set aside a (Star) from a defense roll and add it to your next attack.    Can only attach one rune per armor.

soulShopItems.name: Rune: Protection
soulShopItems.Effect: Attach this to an armor.    If the armor adds only one die or less to defense, add (Enhancement Die) to its defense.    Can only attach one rune per armor.
